_source.text: 2) 'Bad' bishop - I like bad bishops in general, mostly because when I've tried Ba6, with white doing Bxa6 ... Nxa6 the knight often ends up becoming even worse than the B. But in these formations black can often end up becoming totally passive if white plays Ne2-f4 or Ne2-g3.
